name: Project Liquid
description:
CONTROLS

WASD: Move
Shift: Sprint
Space: Dodge roll
F: Pickup
LMB: Fire Weapon
RMB: Aim
MMB:Melee
123/Mouse Wheel: Select Weapon
X:Change Firemode
(hold)Alt: Aim at Cursor
B: Blackmarket
ESC: Pause

This is a very early work in progress build. Please expect bugs, janky assets, and lots of changes.
